hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Tag
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Could be any desired TAG (without the 'F' prefix) or branch name e.g.:7.20A.252.001

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#get Gerrit BRANCH cd ${WORKSPACE}/.. cd GWApp git -c http.sslverify=false fetch || true git checkout ${Tag} Branch=`git branch --no-color -r --contains HEAD | grep -v -e '->' | awk 'NR==1' | awk -F'/' '{print $NF}'` cd ${WORKSPACE} arti_user=admin user=${arti_user}:${arti_password} #copy all scripts related files from sub directory MediantVEBuild to WORKSPACE cp -R MediantVEBuild/* ${WORKSPACE}
artifactory_host=artifactory artifactory_url=https://$artifactory_host/sbc-release/com/ac/sbc/ISO curlHasFailed="False" JENKINS_URL='https://test-jenkins' JOB_NAME="job/sbc-iso${centos_version}" JOB_TOKEN="sbcCreateISO${centos_version}" mkdir artifacts #get the relevant ISO FILE (try to download him once, if it failed try to download it again, if it failing again, triggering sbc-iso job. curl -k -u ${user} --insecure -fO "${artifactory_url}/Centos${centos_version}/${Branch}/${Tag}/sbc-c${centos_version}-F${Tag}.iso" || \ curl -k -u ${user} --insecure -fO "${artifactory_url}/Centos${centos_version}/${Branch}/${Tag}/sbc-c${centos_version}-F${Tag}.iso" || \ curl -k -u ${user} --insecure -fO "${artifactory_url}/Centos${centos_version}/${Branch}/${Tag}/sbc-c${centos_version}-F${Tag}.iso" || \ curlHasFailed="True" if [[ "$curlHasFailed" == "True" ]] then echo "sbc-c${centos_version}-F${Tag}.iso not Exists in Artifactory" echo "****************Create a new ISO*******************" #trigger sbc-iso job to create ISO curl --insecure -v -X POST $JENKINS_URL/$JOB_NAME/buildWithParameters?token=${JOB_TOKEN} --data "Tag=${Tag}" >output 2>&1
cat output #check if job is in queue queueURL=$(cat output | grep Location | cut -d' ' -f3) queueURL=$(echo $queueURL | tr -d '\r\n') echo $queueURL #failed to start the build if [[ $queueURL == "" ]] then echo "Failed to start the build remotely Exiting the build" exit 1 fi #if not find ERROR 404 or EXECUTABLE (BUILD NUMBER) DONT FAIL THE BUILD set +e inQueue=$(curl --insecure -X GET ${queueURL}api/json | grep "executable") ERROR=$(curl --insecure -X GET ${queueURL}api/json | grep "Error 404") queueJson=$(curl --insecure -X GET ${queueURL}api/json?pretty=true) while [[ "$inQueue" == "" && $ERROR == "" ]] do echo "************BUILD STILL IN QUEUE**************************" sleep 20 buildNumber=$(curl --insecure -X GET ${queueURL}api/json?pretty=true | grep number) inQueue=$(curl --insecure -X GET ${queueURL}api/json | grep "executable") echo $inQueue ERROR=$(curl --insecure -X GET ${queueURL}api/json | grep "Error 404") echo $ERROR done set -e if [[ $ERROR != "" ]] then echo "Failed to start the job after been in queue... Exit the build" exit 1 fi buildNumber=$(echo $buildNumber | cut -d':' -f2 |sed s'/[," ]//g') echo $buildNumber #check if job is running JOB_URL=$JENKINS_URL/$JOB_NAME/$buildNumber/api/json curl --insecure --silent $JOB_URL | grep result\":null > /dev/null GREP_RETURN_CODE=$? # Poll every thirty seconds until the build is finished (if result is 0 its "IN PROGRESS" if result is 1 the job FINISHED running set +e while [ $GREP_RETURN_CODE -eq 0 ] do echo "************BUILD IS RUNNING**************************" sleep 240 # Grep will return 0 while the build is running curl --insecure --silent $JOB_URL | grep result\":null > /dev/null GREP_RETURN_CODE=$? done set -e #check JOB STATUS IF PASSED OR FAILED JOB_STATUS=$(curl --insecure -X GET $JENKINS_URL/$JOB_NAME/$buildNumber/api/json?pretty=true | grep result | cut -d':' -f2 | sed 's/[", ]//g') echo $JOB_STATUS if [[ "$JOB_STATUS" == "FAULURE" ]] then echo "Failed to create ISO in job sbc-iso build number $buildNumber" exit 1 fi echo "****************Finish Creating a new ISO*******************" #get the relevant ISO FILE curlHasFailed="False" curl -k -u ${user} --insecure -fO "${artifactory_url}/Centos${centos_version}/${Branch}/${Tag}/sbc-c${centos_version}-F${Tag}.iso" || curlHasFailed="True" if [[ "$curlHasFailed" == "True" ]] then echo "sbc-c${centos_version}-F${Tag}.iso not Exists in Artifactory" exit 1 fi
fi # temporary change to fix verify_sbc function in build_sbc.sh #line='tesseract $WORK_DIR\/screenshot.ppm stdout 2>\&1 | grep -qi \"c.des cli\"' #replace_line='tesseract $WORK_DIR\/screenshot.ppm stdout 2>\&1 | grep -qi \"c.des cl\"' #sed -i "s/${line}/${replace_line}/g" build_sbc.sh
EnvironmentList=("kvm" "azure" "aws" "hyperv" "vmware" "google") # if Environment = all then run all environments if [[ $centos_version == "6" ]] then if [[ "$Environment" == "all" ]] then for FLAVOR in ${EnvironmentList[@]} do cd ${WORKSPACE} ./build_sbc.sh --flavor=${FLAVOR} --iso=${WORKSPACE}/sbc-c${centos_version}-F${Tag}.iso --baseline=${Tag} --outputdir=${WORKSPACE}/artifacts done else # run the Environment that the user choosed ./build_sbc.sh --flavor=${Environment} --iso=${WORKSPACE}/sbc-c${centos_version}-F${Tag}.iso --baseline=${Tag} --outputdir=${WORKSPACE}/artifacts fi fi if [[ $centos_version == "7" ]] then cp ../build_sbc_centos7.sh . if [[ "$Environment" == "all" ]] then for FLAVOR in ${EnvironmentList[@]} do cd ${WORKSPACE} ./build_sbc_centos7.sh --flavor=${FLAVOR} --iso=${WORKSPACE}/sbc-c${centos_version}-F${Tag}.iso --baseline=${Tag} --outputdir=${WORKSPACE}/artifacts done else # run the Environment that the user choosed ./build_sbc_centos7.sh --flavor=${Environment} --iso=${WORKSPACE}/sbc-c${centos_version}-F${Tag}.iso --baseline=${Tag} --outputdir=${WORKSPACE}/artifacts fi
fi
#upload file to artifactory if [[ "$Environment" == "all" ]] then for FLAVOR in ${EnvironmentList[@]} do echo "upload sbc-F${Tag}-${FLAVOR}.zip to artifactory" curl -kv -u ${user} -X PUT "https://artifactory/sbc-release/com/ac/sbc/VSSBC/Centos${centos_version}/${Branch}/${Tag}/" -T ${WORKSPACE}/artifacts/sbc-F${Tag}-${FLAVOR}* done else echo "upload sbc-F${Tag}-${Environment}.zip to artifactory" curl -kv -u ${user} -X PUT "https://artifactory/sbc-release/com/ac/sbc/VSSBC/Centos${centos_version}/${Branch}/${Tag}/" -T ${WORKSPACE}/artifacts/sbc-F${Tag}-${Environment}* fi
echo "Branch=${Branch}" > properties
#, shuky.riechard

hudson.plugins.emailext.ExtendedEmailPub.defaultSubject: Virtual SBC for ${Environment} ${TAG} was created successfully
